\noindent\textbf{Course Outline:} 

\begin{center} \begin{minipage}{6.5in}
\begin{flushleft}
Learning to use the command line \dotfill Week 1 \\
Git and the GitHub ecosystem \dotfill Week 1 \\
Standards of reproducible data collection \dotfill Week 2 \\
Relational Databases and SQL \dotfill Week 3-4 \\
Data architecture \dotfill Week 5 \\
Introduction to \texttt{R} \dotfill Week 6-7 \\
Data munging and wrangling \dotfill Week 8-9 \\
Visualization \dotfill Week 10 \\
Reproducibility and Dynamic Documents \dotfill Week 11-12 \\ 
External Data Sources \dotfill Week 13-14 \\
Special Data Types \dotfill Week 15 \\
